As manager of programming team I was responsible of a development team of 4 persons. My mains projects were - Develop www.pokersapiens.es portal with Symfony 1.4 & JQuery . - Maintenance and creation of new shops in the Natural logistic Network using Oscommerce . - Manage two remote programing teams from India & Ukraine in the development of www.pokervibez.com the poker social network ( Code igniter )

Developer at OpenHouse Barcelona Aprl.2006 - Jan.2008

  • Php
  • Mysql
  • cvs
  • javascript
Online booking system for holidays apartments in several cities. As part of the I.T department , I was involved in the migration to the new version of the platform we had. We start with a buggy version in php 4 almost everything procedural programming and made the migration to a new application based on the MVC pattern, Database server was upgraded to MySql 5 , we add some stored procedures and triggers to enhance integrity.
Also I work in a web-service based in Rest standard. I learned to use svn o cvs , make some administrative task on MySql (backups, triggers, stored procedures,sync) and to use different development environment such a production , pre- producion and local dev. I had workmates from different countries , as were talked english almost all the time, I was able to improve my skills in this language.
